rooms.effect: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

rooms.effect: Target creature gets -4/-0 until your next turn.

rooms.effect: Draw a card.

rooms.name: Yawning Portal
rooms.effect: You gain 1 life.

rooms.effect: Scry 1.

rooms.effect: Create a Treasure token.

rooms.name: Twisted Caverns
rooms.effect: Target creature can't attack until your next turn.

rooms.effect: Scry 2.

rooms.effect: Exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them.

rooms.name: Mad Wizard's Lair
rooms.effect: Draw three cards and reveal them. You may cast one of them without paying its mana cost.

rooms.effect: Each player loses 1 life.

rooms.effect: Each player loses 2 life unless they discard a card.

rooms.name: Sandfall Cell

rooms.effect: Discard a card and sacrifice an artifact, a creature, and a land.

rooms.name: Cradle of the Death God
